security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill consisting of documentation only. No executable code, scripts, network calls, filesystem access, or environment variable reading. The skill provides AI instructions for helping users download videos.

content.user_title: Download videos from YouTube and platforms
content.value_statement: Save videos from YouTube and other platforms to your computer for offline viewing, editing, or archival. Get videos in your preferred quality and format with batch download support.
actual_capabilities: Download videos from YouTube and other platforms
Download entire playlists with one command
Batch download multiple videos at once
Preserve video metadata: title, description, thumbnail
limitations: Depends on external tools like yt-dlp for actual downloads
Platform availability may vary based on tool support
Copyright and terms of service restrictions apply

use_cases.title: Save tutorials for offline learning
use_cases.description: Download educational videos and courses to watch without internet access anytime.

use_cases.title: Archive your own content
use_cases.description: Backup your videos from platforms before they are removed or deleted.

use_cases.title: Build video reference library
use_cases.description: Save conference talks, webinars, and interviews for analysis and reference.

prompt_templates.title: Audio extraction
prompt_templates.prompt: Extract audio from this YouTube video as MP3: [URL]

prompt_templates.title: Playlist download
prompt_templates.prompt: Download all videos from this YouTube playlist: [URL]

output: Video: Rick Astley - Never Gonna Give You Up

best_practices: Specify quality to balance file size and resolution for your needs
Use audio-only mode for podcasts and music to save disk space
Download to a dedicated folder to keep your downloads organized
anti_patterns: Ignoring file size warnings on slow connections

faq.question: Which platforms are supported?
faq.answer: YouTube and other platforms supported by yt-dlp library. Check tool documentation for full list.

faq.question: What video qualities are available?
faq.answer: Common options include 480p, 720p, 1080p, and 4K. Availability depends on the source video.

faq.question: Can I download audio only?
faq.answer: Yes, specify audio-only mode to extract and save as MP3 for music and podcasts.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Downloads run locally on your machine. No data is sent to external servers beyond the download.

faq.question: Why did the download fail?
faq.answer: Common causes: video removed, region restrictions, tool update needed, or network issues.

faq.question: How is this different from browser extensions?
faq.answer: This skill uses command-line tools for more options and control without browser dependencies.
